strapiEvent.name: Orchid Show & Sale
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Join us for our annual Orchid Show & Sale! On Friday, BGO Members will have the first opportunity to purchase orchids and view the entries from this yearâ€™s competition. Saturday and Sunday are open to the public.

Everyone who attends the Basic or Advanced Orchid Classes on February 25th will get a $5 coupon to the Orchid Show & Sale!

$15/adult members or $20/adult nonmembers

$5/ages 4-12 members or 7.50/ages 4-12 nonmembers

$0/ages 3 & under
